availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Knostman (Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, clerk. Native of Germany. Married to Caroline Knostman. Clerk in Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky in 1860. Appointed postmaster in Catlettsburg on July 10, 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 798.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, Adair-Carter, p. 203, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
